name: Foster’s Home
desc: On reveal, add a 1-power Imaginary Friend to each side.

name: Omnitrix Core
desc: Cards here roll a new random power (0-10) each turn.

name: ACME Canyon
desc: If both players play a card this turn here, those cards get +3 power.

name: S.T.A.R. Labs
desc: When one of your cards with an ability reveals here, give another random ally here +2 power.

name: Jump City
desc: If you play exactly two cards here this turn, both gain +2 power.
